remarks: A member of the domain of the least upper bound function is a subset of the base set.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
lubs.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lubs.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lubs.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubs.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
lubs.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. dom U ) $.
lubelss $p |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
